channel.title: Looking for a team of developers for a new RSPS
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt]Quick Link Menu[/size] [iurl=#introduction]Introduction[/iurl] [iurl=#goals]Goals[/iurl] [iurl=#aboutus]About Us[/iurl] [iurl=#staff]Staff List[/iurl] [iurl=#requirements]Coder Position Requirements[/iurl] [iurl=#template]Application Template[/iurl] [iurl=#contact]Contact Methods[/iurl] [/center]
[center][size=24pt][anchor=introduction]Introduction[/size] I am currently in need of a team to work on a new private server, I have yet to come up with a name For now, Im gathering a team, this team will consist of the following: 1x Server Manager 1x Website Designer/Developer 4x Moderators 3x Administrators 4x Forum Staff Members 3x Server Programmers/Coders Any skill not mentioned here you can try to apply for (Please do not apply for in-game staff[Forum staff applications may be accepted]) I have yet to chose a suitable revision(s), I am thinking of either a 317, 562 or 718/742. I might be hosting more than one revision at a time so I may need people who are able to handle 317 and someone else that can handle a 718/742.[/center]
[center][size=24pt][anchor=goals]Goals[/size] - Find a development team ;D ?[/center]
[center][size=24pt][anchor=aboutus]About Me[/size] I am the only member in this team at the moment but I already have a VPS up and running and I also have some experience at coding but I have only just returned to the runescape scene so I'm not up to scratch.[/center]
[center][size=24pt][anchor=staff]Staff List[/size] [size=8pt]NOTE: Things marked with an asterisk(*) means that the position is open. [/size] [b][img]http://img594.imageshack.us/img594/2259/foundercrown.png[/img]Founder[img]http://img594.imageshack.us/img594/2259/foundercrown.png[/img][/b] Brandon
[b]Website Developers[/b] Brandon - Head Developer * - Website Developer
[b][img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/8062/javadevelopers.png[/img]Java Development Team[img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/8062/javadevelopers.png[/img][/b] * - Head Developer Brandon - Java Developer * - Java Developer
[b][img]http://images.wikia.com/mechscape/images/3/31/Jmod_crown.png[/img]Administrators[img]http://images.wikia.com/mechscape/images/3/31/Jmod_crown.png[/img][/b] * - Head Administrator Omelette - Administrator * - Administrator
[b][img]http://i.imgur.com/Died3.gif[/img]Global Moderators[img]http://i.imgur.com/Died3.gif[/img][/b] * - Moderator * - Moderator * - Moderator * - Moderator
[b][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/core/images/im_off.gif[/img]Forum Staff[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/core/images/im_off.gif[/img][/b] * - Forum Manager * - Forums * - Forums * - Forums[/center]
[anchor=requirements][center][size=24pt][b]Requirements[/b][/size] - Must have Skype - Must have Teamviewer - Must Have a BitBucket account and a git client for BitBucket (Sourcetree is recommended) - Must have knowledge or experience with the position you're applying for[/center]
[anchor=template][center][b]To apply for anything use this template.[/b][/center] NOTE: PLEASE STICK TO THE TEMPLATE AS IT IS EASIER FOR ME TO ACCEPT YOUR APPLICATION! [center][code]Nickname/In-Game Name: Age: Skype username: Country: Timezone: Position applying for: Past experience: Why do you want to apply for this position?: Hours available per day:[/code][/center]
[anchor=contact] [size=36pt]Contact Us[/size] [size=18pt][b]Skype[/b][/size] projectcxr

item.title: Looking for a team of developers for a new RSPS
item.dc:creator: @jummppy jummppy
item.description:
@jummppy wrote:

Nickname/In-Game Name: Wanted
Age: 17
Skype username: owner_ghost
Country: U.S.A
Timezone: Central U.S.
Position applying for: Server Developer
Past experience: Been working on a server for a while now.
Why do you want to apply for this position?: So i can help with a project. And if a community grows, play with the players and help develop content they want.
Hours available per day: anywhere from 4-8hrs

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for a team of developers for a new RSPS

item.title: Looking for a team of developers for a new RSPS

item.description:
@tx577 wrote:

Nickname/In-Game Name: Tx577
Age:16
Skype username: hectoralanvazquez77@hotmail.com
Country: United States
Timezone: Pacific Time Zone (UTC-08:00)
Position applying for: Administrator
Past experience:I have been Co-Owner as well as Administrator once and moderator twice
Why do you want to apply for this position?: I believe it is suitable for me as I am online most of the time and can be online when needed, as well as know many things in-game
Hours available per day:5+

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for a team of developers for a new RSPS

item.title: Looking for a team of developers for a new RSPS
item.dc:creator: @ethanhello ethanhello
item.description:
@ethanhello wrote:

Nickname/In-Game Name: Ethan
Age: 19
Skype username: ethanhello
Country: England
Timezone: +0 GMT
Position applying for: Forum Moderator, due to limited time available - Moderator, for reasons below
Past experience: Been playing RS for 10 years, RSPS for 5, Owned my own (unsuccessful) sevrer, Moderator on numerous smaller servers.
Why do you want to apply for this position?: I love to integrate with a community, and make a difference within it, I feel that I have a very good influence on people and maybe I can make the difference in a large community. The reason for wanting the position is to ensure everyone feels like they are in a nice environment within the community and never feels threatened, and I think I could be the man to instigate, control and keep the community steady and loving for as long as possible. - Moderator for the same reasoning, I feel moderators have a large impact on a community and that it will be a lot easier in that position to help the community get a long with each other, obviously as the RSPS community can cause some online scuffles I feel as if I am very good in diffusing these issues quickly and remedying them so that both parties feel appeased.
Hours available per day: When not in work 10+ hours (work 5-6 days a week) - When in work 3-6 hours. - Obviously varies due to other activities.

As a side note, The reason I would like to start in a position like this is that I feel very approachable to new players, and that new players always love to feel noticed and not as if they are just another new guy, and from that start I feel that I would be able to make a good impression for the server from day one.

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for a team of developers for a new RSPS

item.title: Looking for a team of developers for a new RSPS
item.dc:creator: @sertan8 sertan8
item.description:
@sertan8 wrote:

[quote=“Turkpride33, post:4, topic:543711”]Nickname/In-Game Name:Deniz
Age:16
Skype username:live:gezmis1998
Country: australia atm
Timezone: not sure umm pacific eastern i think
Position applying for: moderator would be good enough
Past experience:been a co-owner most of my time on rsps’s or admins
Why do you want to apply for this position?:because when im an co-owner or admin like most servers gets boring and loose intrest when u can spawn everything and such im in the moderator because you dont get to much power and you can still grind for your weapons and items and such plus having some power to keep the rule breakers out of the server is always nice and im only ussualy on servers 10-15 hours min
Hours available per day: 10 -15 hours min no job or school atm so yes… i have no life xD[/quote]

15 hours! stop it!

Read full topic

Past experience:Coded like 3 private servers all source based, this one has been released https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=448966.0,
and experience of reverse engineering 317 Clients

item.title: Looking for a team of developers for a new RSPS
item.dc:creator: @Gh0stPred Gh0stPred
item.description:
@Gh0stPred wrote:

Nickname/In-Game Name: Gh0stPred

Age: 18

Skype username: gh0stpred

Country: UK

Timezone: GMT+1

Position applying for: Administrator and Forum Staff

Past experience: Not much as such. Only been staff on my servers and a few others but they were all small ones. Never been staff on big servers like Soulsplit etc.

Why do you want to apply for this position?: Because I know what the Community is like and everything like that I want to help the Community of your server and have very low sence of abusive language etc… Yeah I swear and Flame and everything like that but not 24/7 if you get what I mean. I want to help people and give their ideas to both Developers and Owners of the server so they can implement it depending on if they like it

Hours available per day: As many as you want me for Probably around 3 - 5 Hours a day ish

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for a team of developers for a new RSPS

item.description:
@BrandonRSPS wrote:

[center][size=24pt]Quick Link Menu[/size]

[center][size=24pt][anchor=introduction]Introduction[/size]
I am currently in need of a team to work on a new private server, I have yet to come up with a name
For now, Im gathering a team, this team will consist of the following:
1x Server Manager
1x Website Designer/Developer
4x Moderators
3x Administrators
4x Forum Staff Members
3x Server Programmers/Coders
Any skill not mentioned here you can try to apply for (Please do not apply for in-game staff[Forum staff applications may be accepted])
I have yet to chose a suitable revision(s), I am thinking of either a 317, 562 or 718/742.
I might be hosting more than one revision at a time so I may need people who are able to handle 317 and someone else that can handle a 718/742.[/center]

[center][size=24pt][anchor=goals]Goals[/size]

  • Find a development team ;D ?[/center]

[center][size=24pt][anchor=aboutus]About Me[/size]
I am the only member in this team at the moment but I already have a VPS up and running and I also have some experience at coding but I have only just returned to the runescape scene so I’m not up to scratch.[/center]

[center][size=24pt][anchor=staff]Staff List[/size]
